resources.string: Tomboy compatible wikiwiki note-taking application that can take notes.
Будь ласка, почекайте поки нотатки завантажаться
Немає нотаток у базі данних Tomdroid

Welcome to Tomdroid.

Please note that this is beta quality software and that it contains known problems.

We are well aware of these issues and intend to work on them quickly but I also wanted to get something out and tested as quickly as possible.

If you would like to contribute, help at all levels would be appreciated. Hop on board on launchpad.net/tomdroid and contact us!
Папка \"%1$s\" ще не існує. Будь-ласка, під\'єднайте Ваш пристрій до комп\'ютера, створіть папку і заповніть її *. Note файлами.
\"%1$s\" is not a valid folder location. Please try again!
\"%1$s\" is not a valid entry. Please try again!
Підключення до серверу неможливе, будь ласка, перевірте, чи правильну адресу ви ввели.
Адреса серверу змінилась, але нове значення порожнє
При розборі ваших нотаток сталась помилка. Якщо ви взмозі описати проблему, будь ласка, зв\'яжіться з нами!
Неможливо знайти необхідний запис. Можливо він був видалений або зтертий при синхронізації.
Немає збірників у базі данних Tomdroid
Видалити всі пошуки, що ви здійснювали
Are you sure you want to delete this note?
Are you sure you want to clear the notes database?
Are you sure you want to delete all notes from the remote service?
There was an error parsing the note. Please check your XML.
Do you really want to discard your changes and revert the note to the last saved version?
Save notes automatically on exiting editor.
If checked, will show deleted notes in notes list.
If checked, will show note templates in notes list.
Clear all notes from local database
Delete all notes from remote service
Illegal text size chosen. Please choose a number.
Copy all local notes to SD Card
Copy local note to SD Card on save
There was a conflict syncing the note \'%1$s\'. Please choose an action to resolve the conflict. You may edit either note before choosing, or view the difference by clicking on the labels below.
There was a conflict syncing the note \'%1$s\' (local version was deleted). Please choose from one of the actions below.

There was a conflict syncing the note \'%1$s\'. A note with that title already exists in the database. Please choose an action to resolve the conflict. You may edit either note before choosing, or view the difference by clicking on the labels below.
Authorization with %1$s failed. Maybe try again?
Error connecting to %1$s. You probably need to authenticate in "Settings".
Edit the tags below, separating with commas
This will revert your local notes to whatever versions exist on the remote service. Are you sure you want to do this?
This will revert a local note to whatever version exist on the remote service. Are you sure you want to do this?
Copy all local notes to SD Card? This may overwrite existing notes on the SD Card.
Pull all notes from SD Card
Pull all notes from SD Card? This may overwrite your existing notes.
Notes backed up to SD card successfully.
Notes restored from SD card successfully.
How would you like to send the note?

There was a conflict importing the note "%1$s". The note already exists in the database. Please choose an action to resolve the conflict. You may edit either note before choosing, or view the difference by clicking on the labels below.

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, Ubuntu One, your own Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n

Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes. The notes can be found in ~/.local/share/tomboy/ on Linux.\n

Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. The notes can be found in ~/.local/share/tomboy/ on Linux. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
See http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the notes\' location on other platforms.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

resources.string:
A Tomboy client for Android. Tomboy is a desktop note-taking app using a wikiwiki approach and a simple user interface.

* Note format compatibility with Tomboy
* Online note synchronization with Snowy, Tomboy Online or Ubuntu One
* SD Card importation
* Open source!
Програма для ведення заміток, сумісна з Tomboy та з можливістю синхронізації

0.6 "Small World" release
* Create home-screen shortcuts to notes
* Specify a folder to use for SD Card sync
* Reload current note after sync
* A lot of new translations: ar, bs, ca, cs, da, de, el, en-rGB, eo, es, eu, fa, fi, fo, fr, gd, hi, hu, it, ja, ko, ms, nb, pl, pt, pt-rBR, ru, si, sv, ta, te, tr, ug, uk, zh, zh-rCN
* Several bugfixes
Launchpad Contributions: ALEXua https://launchpad.net/~fotimail Asalle Kim https://launchpad.net/~asaly12 Maxim Nosovets https://launchpad.net/~nosovetz
